title: When the mods think they're being targeted and haven't just policed Boards into oblivion
body:
https://i.imgur.com/7cfsJ4z.png

I haven't been on Boards much since becoming a TFT player, only recently checking and this is what I find. Then again, what do I know? 
I just took a whole 3 minutes to make this image; maybe there is someone out there who made scripts solely to downvote our adoring mods.

replies.body: If your meme doesn't directly harass or insult, it can stay, even if it criticizes mods. If the mod team likes it, they may even join in. Source: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/8vFXBiTu
The difference between 3 minutes and 10; you sir, make me ashamed for my lack of effort on this front and I apologize for so.

> [{quoted}](name=BigPapaPimpins,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jQL5pgac,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-30T04:45:56.922+0000)
>
> The difference between 3 minutes and 10; you sir, make me ashamed for my lack of effort on this front and I apologize for so.

Actually took about two hours, not 10 minutes. =S I'm not as good with VideoPad as I'd like.
What the fuck is this and why do you think it offends someone?
I'm not sure what your picture is showing. For that, I -1.
